content: This is a list of [airlines](/wiki/Airline) which have a current [Air Operator Certificate](/wiki/Air_Operator_Certificate) issued by the [Civil Aviation Authority of Singapore](/wiki/Civil_Aviation_Authority_of_Singapore). ## Scheduled airlines AirlineImage[IATA](/wiki/IATA)[ICAO](/wiki/ICAO_airline_code)CallsignCommenced operations[Scoot](/wiki/Scoot)TRTGWSCOOTER2012[Singapore Airlines](/wiki/Singapore_Airlines)SQSIASINGAPORE1972 ## Cargo airlines AirlineImage[IATA](/wiki/IATA)[ICAO](/wiki/ICAO_airline_code)CallsignCommenced operations[Singapore Airlines Cargo](/wiki/Singapore_Airlines_Cargo)SQSQCSINGAPORE2001 - [List of airlines](/wiki/List_of_airlines) - [List of defunct airlines of Singapore](/wiki/List_of_defunct_airlines_of_Singapore) - [List of airports in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_airports_in_Singapore) - [List of defunct airlines of Asia](/wiki/List_of_defunct_airlines_of_Asia)
title: List of airlines of Singapore
